duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the financial records and transactions of the landscaping business, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulations.
Prepare and file tax returns for the business, taking advantage of available deductions and credits to minimize tax liability.
Produce financial reports to track the business's performance and inform strategic decision-making.
Maintain organized and up-to-date records of income and expenses through effective bookkeeping.
Manage payroll processes and ensure timely payment to employees, including tax withholding.
Develop and manage budgets to guide the financial operations and investments of the landscaping business.
Conduct financial analysis to assess the business's financial health and identify areas for improvement.
Exercise meticulous attention to detail and apply strong analytical skills in financial management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (CPA preferred)
